name: Five Nights At Freddy's: New Chapter
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's: New Chapter
description:
Five Nights At Freddy's: New Chapter is an adventure game developed by CRASHERSTUDEO. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by CRASHERSTUDEO. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Five Nights At Freddy's: New Chapter is available on PC.
